name: Coins of Sword and Wand
description:
Instructions

You are a fighter in the arena to fight other fighters. Collects plain coins to produce "Coins of Sword and Wand". Which you can use it to improve your character when you toss it, you also can guess which face will out "Sword" or "Wand". If it correct, your character will gain more ability and also recovery.

Controls 
[W] - Move Forward
[S] - Move Backward
[A] - Move Left
[D] - Move Right
[1] - Switch to Warrior form
[2] - Switch to Archer form
[3] - Switch to Mage form
[Q] - Toss coin for Sword face
[E] - Toss coin for Wand face
[Space] - Jump
[Esc] - Back To Main Menu
[Tab] - Toggle Instructions
